    • Method Detail

      • getEntities

        public java.util.Vector<Entity> getEntities()
        Method that makes simpler the drawing of each entities. By calling this method and iterate through the vector, you can then draw them with the getImage method from the Entity interface. The first element should always be the player. If not, it has to be precised.
        Returns:
        a vector with all the entities of the current game.
        See Also:
        Entity

      • setPlayerRank

        public void setPlayerRank(int rank)
        set the rank of the player in the entities table. Default rank is zero.
        Parameters:
        rank - the rank in the entities table.

      • loadResources

        public void loadResources(java.util.HashMap<Resources,java.lang.String> resources)
        Method that will load a bunch of resources at once.
        Parameters:
        resources - the resources to load stored as pairs : Resources - String (resource name - resource file)

      • unloadAll

        public void unloadAll()
        Method used to unload every resources in the resource manager

      • addEntity

        public void addEntity(Entity e)
        add an entity in the entities tables.
        Parameters:
        e - the entity to add

      • supEntity

        public void supEntity(Entity e)

      • loadAll

        public void loadAll()
        Method permitting to load every resources in the game at once. (Usuful, since the number of resources is low)

      • getLabyrinth

        public Labyrinth getLabyrinth()
